marketplaces.name: pluginagentmarketplace-technical-writer
marketplaces.description: Production-grade Claude Code plugin for professional technical documentation with enterprise-level reliability, observability, and quality assurance.
marketplaces.repo_description: Technical writer plugin with documentation templates and API docs

files..claude-plugin/plugin.json:
{
  "name": "custom-plugin-technical-writer",
  "version": "2.0.0",
  "description": "Production-grade Technical Writer plugin with AI-powered documentation assistance, comprehensive API documentation templates, and enterprise-level content optimization tools. SASMP v1.3.0 compliant.",
  "author": "Claude Code Plugin Marketplace",
  "license": "SEE LICENSE IN LICENSE",
  "eqhm_enabled": true,
  "keywords": [
    "technical-writing",
    "documentation",
    "api-docs",
    "guides",
    "tutorials",
    "content-creation",
    "markdown",
    "swagger",
    "openapi",
    "production-grade",
    "enterprise"
  ],
  "repository": "https://github.com/pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-technical-writer",
  "agents": [
    "./agents/technical-writer-specialist.md"
  ],
  "commands": [
    "./commands/write-docs.md",
    "./commands/api-template.md",
    "./commands/review-docs.md",
    "./commands/generate-examples.md"
  ],
  "skills": [
    "./skills/api-docs/SKILL.md",
    "./skills/guides/SKILL.md",
    "./skills/examples/SKILL.md"
  ],
  "production_config": {
    "observability": {
      "logging_level": "info",
      "trace_enabled": true,
      "metrics_collection": true
    },
    "error_handling": {
      "retry_attempts": 3,
      "backoff_strategy": "exponential",
      "fallback_enabled": true
    },
    "quality_gates": {
      "min_quality_score": 80,
      "required_sections": [
        "troubleshooting",
        "examples"
      ],
      "validation_required": true
    }
  },
  "marketplaceMetadata": {
    "category": "Documentation & Content",
    "tier": "professional",
    "supportedRoles": [
      "technical-writer",
      "documentation-engineer",
      "developer-advocate",
      "content-creator",
      "api-developer"
    ],
    "documentationTypes": [
      "API Documentation",
      "User Guides",
      "Tutorials",
      "Code Examples",
      "Release Notes",
      "Architecture Guides",
      "OpenAPI Specifications",
      "Troubleshooting Guides"
    ],
    "toolsSupported": [
      "Markdown",
      "OpenAPI/Swagger 3.1",
      "AsyncAPI",
      "ReStructuredText",
      "HTML/CSS",
      "YAML",
      "TypeScript Schemas"
    ],
    "difficulty": "beginner-to-advanced",
    "features": [
      "Production-grade error handling",
      "Input/Output schema validation",
      "Multi-language code examples (11 languages)",
      "Retry logic with exponential backoff",
      "Observability hooks",
      "Quality metrics and scoring",
      "Troubleshooting decision trees",
      "Comprehensive unit test templates"
    ]
  },
  "changelog": {
    "2.0.0": {
      "date": "2025-01-15",
      "changes": [
        "Production-grade upgrade for all agents and skills",
        "Added I/O schemas with TypeScript interfaces",
        "Implemented error handling with retry logic",
        "Added observability hooks for logging and metrics",
        "Created troubleshooting guides with decision trees",
        "Added unit test templates for all skills",
        "Standardized exit codes for all commands",
        "Enhanced code examples with 11 language support"
      ]
    },
    "1.0.0": {
      "date": "2024-11-18",
      "changes": [
        "Initial release"
      ]
    }
  }
}
files.README.md:
[![Version](https://img.shields.io/badge/Version-1.0.0-blue?style=for-the-badge)](https://github.com/pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-technical-writer/releases) [![License](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-Custom-yellow?style=for-the-badge)](LICENSE) [![Status](https://img.shields.io/badge/Status-Production-brightgreen?style=for-the-badge)](#) [![SASMP](https://img.shields.io/badge/SASMP-v1.3.0-blueviolet?style=for-the-badge)](#) [![Agents](https://img.shields.io/badge/Agents-1-orange?style=flat-square&logo=robot)](#-agents) [![Skills](https://img.shields.io/badge/Skills-3-purple?style=flat-square&logo=lightning)](#-skills) [![Commands](https://img.shields.io/badge/Commands-4-green?style=flat-square&logo=terminal)](#-commands)
[üì¶ **Install Now**](#-quick-start) ¬∑ [ü§ñ **Explore Agents**](#-agents) ¬∑ [üìñ **Documentation**](#-documentation) ¬∑ [‚≠ê **Star this repo**](https://github.com/pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-technical-writer) --- ### What is this? > **Technical Writer Assistant** is a Claude Code plugin with **1 agents** and **3 skills** for technical writer development.
--- ## üìë Table of Contents
Click to expand - [Quick Start](#-quick-start) - [Features](#-features) - [Agents](#-agents) - [Skills](#-skills) - [Commands](#-commands) - [Documentation](#-documentation) - [Contributing](#-contributing) - [License](#-license)
--- ## üöÄ Quick Start ### Prerequisites - Claude Code CLI v2.0.27+ - Active Claude subscription ### Installation (Choose One)
Option 1: From Marketplace (Recommended) ```bash # Step 1Ô∏è‚É£ Add the marketplace /plugin marketplace add pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-technical-writer # Step 2Ô∏è‚É£ Install the plugin /plugin install custom-plugin-technical-writer@pluginagentmarketplace-technical-writer # Step 3Ô∏è‚É£ Restart Claude Code # Close and reopen your terminal/IDE ```
Option 2: Local Installation ```bash # Clone the repository git clone https://github.com/pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-technical-writer.git cd custom-plugin-technical-writer # Load locally /plugin load . # Restart Claude Code ```
### ‚úÖ Verify Installation After restart, you should see these agents: ``` custom-plugin-technical-writer:technical-writer-specialist ``` --- ## ‚ú® Features | Feature | Description | |---------|-------------| | ü§ñ **1 Agents** | Specialized AI agents for technical writer tasks | | üõ†Ô∏è **3 Skills** | Reusable capabilities with Golden Format | | ‚å®Ô∏è **4 Commands** | Quick slash commands | | üîÑ **SASMP v1.3.0** | Full protocol compliance | --- ## ü§ñ Agents ### 1 Specialized Agents | # | Agent | Purpose | |---|-------|---------| | 1 | **technical-writer-specialist** | Expert technical writer specializing in API documentation, u | --- ## üõ†Ô∏è Skills ### Available Skills | Skill | Description | Invoke | |-------|-------------|--------| | `guides` | Create clear, comprehensive user guides and tutorials includ | `Skill("custom-plugin-technical-writer:guides")` | | `examples` | Generate clear, well-documented code examples, implementatio | `Skill("custom-plugin-technical-writer:examples")` | | `api-docs` | Master API documentation creation including OpenAPI/Swagger | `Skill("custom-plugin-technical-writer:api-docs")` | --- ## ‚å®Ô∏è Commands | Command | Description | |---------|-------------| | `/api-template` | template - OpenAPI/Swagger Template Generator | | `/review-docs` | docs - Documentation Review & Improvement | | `/generate-examples` | examples - Code Example Generator | | `/write-docs` | docs - Documentation Project Assistant | --- ## üìö Documentation | Document | Description | |----------|-------------| | [CHANGELOG.md](CHANGELOG.md) | Version history | | [CONTRIBUTING.md](CONTRIBUTING.md) | How to contribute | | [LICENSE](LICENSE) | License information | --- ## üìÅ Project Structure
Click to expand ``` custom-plugin-technical-writer/ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ üìÅ .claude-plugin/ ‚îÇ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ plugin.json ‚îÇ ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ marketplace.json ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ üìÅ agents/ # 1 agents ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ üìÅ skills/ # 3 skills (Golden Format) ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ üìÅ commands/ # 4 commands ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ üìÅ hooks/ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ üìÑ README.md ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ üìÑ CHANGELOG.md ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ üìÑ LICENSE ```
--- ## üìÖ Metadata | Field | Value | |-------|-------| | **Version** | 1.0.0 | | **Last Updated** | 2025-12-29 | | **Status** | Production Ready | | **SASMP** | v1.3.0 | | **Agents** | 1 | | **Skills** | 3 | | **Commands** | 4 | --- ## ü§ù Contributing Contributions are welcome! Please read our [Contributing Guide](CONTRIBUTING.md). 1. Fork the repository 2. Create your feature branch 3. Follow the Golden Format for new skills 4. Submit a pull request --- ## ‚ö†Ô∏è Security > **Important:** This repository contains third-party code and dependencies. > > - ‚úÖ Always review code before using in production > - ‚úÖ Check dependencies for known vulnerabilities > - ‚úÖ Follow security best practices > - ‚úÖ Report security issues privately via [Issues](../../issues) --- ## üìù License Copyright ¬© 2025 **Dr. Umit Kacar** & **Muhsin Elcicek** Custom License - See [LICENSE](LICENSE) for details. --- ## üë• Contributors

Senior AI Researcher & Engineer 		Muhsin Elcicek
Senior Software Architect

Click to expand - [Quick Start](#-quick-start) - [Features](#-features) - [Agents](#-agents) - [Skills](#-skills) - [Commands](#-commands) - [Documentation](#-documentation) - [Contributing](#-contributing) - [License](#-license)
--- ## üöÄ Quick Start ### Prerequisites - Claude Code CLI v2.0.27+ - Active Claude subscription ### Installation (Choose One)
Option 1: From Marketplace (Recommended) ```bash # Step 1Ô∏è‚É£ Add the marketplace /plugin marketplace add pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-sql # Step 2Ô∏è‚É£ Install the plugin /plugin install custom-plugin-sql@pluginagentmarketplace-sql # Step 3Ô∏è‚É£ Restart Claude Code # Close and reopen your terminal/IDE ```
Option 2: Local Installation ```bash # Clone the repository git clone https://github.com/pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-sql.git cd custom-plugin-sql # Load locally /plugin load . # Restart Claude Code ```
### ‚úÖ Verify Installation After restart, you should see these agents: ``` custom-plugin-sql:05-data-analyst custom-plugin-sql:01-sql-fundamentals custom-plugin-sql:03-mongodb custom-plugin-sql:02-postgresql-dba custom-plugin-sql:04-redis ... and 2 more ``` --- ## ‚ú® Features | Feature | Description | |---------|-------------| | ü§ñ **8 Agents** | Specialized AI agents for sql tasks | | üõ†Ô∏è **17 Skills** | Reusable capabilities with Golden Format | | ‚å®Ô∏è **4 Commands** | Quick slash commands | | üîÑ **SASMP v1.3.0** | Full protocol compliance | --- ## ü§ñ Agents ### 8 Specialized Agents | # | Agent | Purpose | |---|-------|---------| | 1 | **05-data-analyst** | Learn SQL for data analysis with comprehensive coverage of e | | 2 | **01-sql-fundamentals** | Master SQL fundamentals including DDL, DML, joins, subquerie | | 3 | **03-mongodb** | Master MongoDB and document-oriented database design with co | | 4 | **02-postgresql-dba** | Become a PostgreSQL Database Administrator mastering install | | 5 | **04-redis** | Master Redis for high-performance caching, real-time applica | | 6 | **06-data-engineer** | Master data engineering with comprehensive coverage of datab | | 7 | **07-bi-analyst** | Learn Business Intelligence with comprehensive coverage of S | --- ## üõ†Ô∏è Skills ### Available Skills | Skill | Description | Invoke | |-------|-------------|--------| | `sql-fundamentals` | Master SQL fundamentals including SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DE | `Skill("custom-plugin-sql:sql-fundamentals")` | | `redis` | Redis data structures and commands including strings, lists, | `Skill("custom-plugin-sql:redis")` | | `data-analyst` | SQL for data analysis with exploratory analysis, advanced ag | `Skill("custom-plugin-sql:data-analyst")` | | `bi-analyst` | BI fundamentals with metric definition, KPI calculation, dim | `Skill("custom-plugin-sql:bi-analyst")` | | `postgresql-dba` | PostgreSQL administration and setup including installation, | `Skill("custom-plugin-sql:postgresql-dba")` | | `data-engineer` | Data warehouse design mastery with star schema, dimensional | `Skill("custom-plugin-sql:data-engineer")` | | `mongodb` | MongoDB fundamentals including document model, CRUD operatio | `Skill("custom-plugin-sql:mongodb")` | --- ## ‚å®Ô∏è Commands | Command | Description | |---------|-------------| | `/learn` | Learn SQL & Database Mastery | | `/assess` | Knowledge Assessment | | `/browse-agent` | Browse Database Agents | | `/projects` | Hands-On Projects | --- ## üìö Documentation | Document | Description | |----------|-------------| | [CHANGELOG.md](CHANGELOG.md) | Version history | | [CONTRIBUTING.md](CONTRIBUTING.md) | How to contribute | | [LICENSE](LICENSE) | License information | --- ## files..claude-plugin/plugin.json:
{
  "name": "typescript-developer-plugin",
  "version": "2.0.0",
  "description": "Master TypeScript development with comprehensive learning paths, skill assessment, and career progression guidance across frontend, backend, and full-stack development",
  "author": {
    "name": "Dr. Umit Kacar & Muhsin Elcicek",
    "email": "kacarumit.phd@gmail.com",
    "url": "https://github.com/pluginagentmarketplace"
  },
  "homepage": "https://github.com/pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-typescript",
  "repository": "https://github.com/pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-typescript",
  "license": "SEE LICENSE IN LICENSE",
  "keywords": [
    "typescript",
    "frontend",
    "backend",
    "devops",
    "learning-paths",
    "claude-code",
    "plugin"
  ],
  "agents": [
    "./agents/01-typescript-fundamentals.md",
    "./agents/02-typescript-backend.md",
    "./agents/03-devops-cloud-infrastructure.md",
    "./agents/04-data-engineering-analytics.md",
    "./agents/05-ai-emerging-technologies.md",
    "./agents/06-security-qa-practices.md",
    "./agents/07-career-management-leadership.md"
  ],
  "skills": [
    "./skills/ai/SKILL.md",
    "./skills/backend/SKILL.md",
    "./skills/career/SKILL.md",
    "./skills/data/SKILL.md",
    "./skills/devops/SKILL.md",
    "./skills/frontend/SKILL.md",
    "./skills/security/SKILL.md"
  ],
  "commands": [
    "./commands/assess.md",
    "./commands/explore.md",
    "./commands/roadmap.md",

files.README.md:
[![Version](https://img.shields.io/badge/Version-2.0.0-blue?style=for-the-badge)](https://github.com/pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-typescript/releases) [![License](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-Custom-yellow?style=for-the-badge)](LICENSE) [![Status](https://img.shields.io/badge/Status-Production-brightgreen?style=for-the-badge)](#) [![SASMP](https://img.shields.io/badge/SASMP-v1.3.0-blueviolet?style=for-the-badge)](#) [![Agents](https://img.shields.io/badge/Agents-7-orange?style=flat-square&logo=robot)](#-agents) [![Skills](https://img.shields.io/badge/Skills-7-purple?style=flat-square&logo=lightning)](#-skills) [![Commands](https://img.shields.io/badge/Commands-4-green?style=flat-square&logo=terminal)](#-commands)
[üì¶ **Install Now**](#-quick-start) ¬∑ [ü§ñ **Explore Agents**](#-agents) ¬∑ [üìñ **Documentation**](#-documentation) ¬∑ [‚≠ê **Star this repo**](https://github.com/pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-typescript) --- ### What is this? > **Typescript Assistant** is a Claude Code plugin with **7 agents** and **7 skills** for typescript development.
--- ## üìë Table of Contents
Click to expand - [Quick Start](#-quick-start) - [Features](#-features) - [Agents](#-agents) - [Skills](#-skills) - [Commands](#-commands) - [Documentation](#-documentation) - [Contributing](#-contributing) - [License](#-license)
--- ## üöÄ Quick Start ### Prerequisites - Claude Code CLI v2.0.27+ - Active Claude subscription ### Installation (Choose One)
Option 1: From Marketplace (Recommended) ```bash # Step 1Ô∏è‚É£ Add the marketplace /plugin marketplace add pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-typescript # Step 2Ô∏è‚É£ Install the plugin /plugin install typescript-developer-plugin@pluginagentmarketplace-typescript # Step 3Ô∏è‚É£ Restart Claude Code # Close and reopen your terminal/IDE ```
Option 2: Local Installation ```bash # Clone the repository git clone https://github.com/pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-typescript.git cd custom-plugin-typescript # Load locally /plugin load . # Restart Claude Code ```
### ‚úÖ Verify Installation After restart, you should see these agents: ``` typescript-developer-plugin:03-devops-cloud-infrastructure typescript-developer-plugin:07-career-management-leadership typescript-developer-plugin:02-backend-database-engineering typescript-developer-plugin:05-ai-emerging-technologies typescript-developer-plugin:06-security-qa-practices ... and 2 more ``` --- ## ‚ú® Features | Feature | Description | |---------|-------------| | ü§ñ **7 Agents** | Specialized AI agents for typescript tasks | | üõ†Ô∏è **7 Skills** | Reusable capabilities with Golden Format | | ‚å®Ô∏è **4 Commands** | Quick slash commands | | üîÑ **SASMP v1.3.0** | Full protocol compliance | --- ## ü§ñ Agents ### 7 Specialized Agents | # | Agent | Purpose | |---|-------|---------| | 1 | **03-devops-cloud-infrastructure** | Master cloud infrastructure, containerization, CI/CD, and De | | 2 | **07-career-management-leadership** | Develop career paths and leadership skills across 6+ roles i | | 3 | **02-backend-database-engineering** | Master server-side development, API design, and database eng | | 4 | **05-ai-emerging-technologies** | Master AI, ML, emerging technologies across 6+ roles includi | | 5 | **06-security-qa-practices** | Master security, QA, testing, and best practices across 7+ r | | 6 | **04-data-engineering-analytics** | Master data engineering, analytics, and business intelligenc | | 7 | **01-frontend-ui-development** | Master web interface development, modern frameworks, respons | --- ## üõ†Ô∏è Skills ### Available Skills | Skill | Description | Invoke | |-------|-------------|--------| | `career` | Master career development, leadership, communication, and or | `Skill("typescript-developer-plugin:career")` | | `devops` | Master DevOps, cloud infrastructure, containerization, CI/CD | `Skill("typescript-developer-plugin:devops")` | | `frontend` | Master modern web development with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Re | `Skill("typescript-developer-plugin:frontend")` | | `security` | Master secure development, OWASP top 10, testing, and compli | `Skill("typescript-developer-plugin:security")` | | `backend` | Master backend development with Node.js, Python, Java, Go, R | `Skill("typescript-developer-plugin:backend")` | | `ai` | Master AI, machine learning, LLMs, prompt engineering, and b | `Skill("typescript-developer-plugin:ai")` | | `data` | Master data engineering, ETL/ELT, data warehousing, SQL opti | `Skill("typescript-developer-plugin:data")` | --- ## ‚å®Ô∏è Commands | Command | Description | |---------|-------------| | `/explore` | Explore All 65+ Developer Roles | | `/assess` | Assess Your Current Skills | | `/roadmap` | Your Personalized Learning Roadmap | | `/start` | Start Your Developer Roadmap Journey | --- ## üìö Documentation | Document | Description | |----------|-------------| | [CHANGELOG.md](CHANGELOG.md) | Version history | | [CONTRIBUTING.md](CONTRIBUTING.md) | How to contribute | | [LICENSE](LICENSE) | License information | --- ## üìÅ Project Structure
Click to expand ``` custom-plugin-typescript/ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ üìÅ .claude-plugin/ ‚îÇ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ plugin.json ‚îÇ ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ marketplace.json ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ üìÅ agents/ # 7 agents ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ üìÅ skills/ # 7 skills (Golden Format) ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ üìÅ commands/ # 4 commands ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ üìÅ hooks/ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ üìÑ README.md ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ üìÑ CHANGELOG.md ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ üìÑ LICENSE ```
--- ## üìÖ Metadata | Field | Value | |-------|-------| | **Version** | 2.0.0 | | **Last Updated** | 2025-12-29 | | **Status** | Production Ready | | **SASMP** | v1.3.0 | | **Agents** | 7 | | **Skills** | 7 | | **Commands** | 4 | --- ## ü§ù Contributing Contributions are welcome! Please read our [Contributing Guide](CONTRIBUTING.md). 1. Fork the repository 2. Create your feature branch 3. Follow the Golden Format for new skills 4. Submit a pull request --- ## ‚ö†Ô∏è Security > **Important:** This repository contains third-party code and dependencies. > > - ‚úÖ Always review code before using in production > - ‚úÖ Check dependencies for known vulnerabilities > - ‚úÖ Follow security best practices > - ‚úÖ Report security issues privately via [Issues](../../issues) --- ## üìù License Copyright ¬© 2025 **Dr. Umit Kacar** & **Muhsin Elcicek** Custom License - See [LICENSE](LICENSE) for details. --- ## üë• Contributors

Senior Software Architect

files..claude-plugin/plugin.json:
{
  "name": "ios-development-assistant",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "iOS development plugin with agents for Swift, UIKit, SwiftUI, and App Store deployment",
  "author": "Roadmap Team",
  "homepage": "https://roadmap.sh",
  "repository": "https://github.com/kamranahmedse/developer-roadmap",
  "keywords": [
    "learning",
    "roadmap",
    "developer",
    "career-path",
    "ai-ml",
    "frontend",
    "backend",
    "devops",
    "mobile",
    "games",
    "specialized-roles",
    "fundamentals"
  ],
  "agents": [
    "./agents/01-ios-fundamentals.md",
    "./agents/02-uikit-development.md",
    "./agents/03-swiftui-development.md",
    "./agents/04-data-persistence.md",
    "./agents/05-networking-apis.md",
    "./agents/06-testing-debugging.md",
    "./agents/07-app-store.md"
  ],
  "commands": [
    {
      "name": "learn",
      "path": "./commands/learn.md",
      "description": "Start guided learning path selection for your career goals"
    },
    {
      "name": "browse-roadmap",
      "path": "./commands/browse-roadmap.md",
      "description": "Explore and filter all 75+ available roadmaps by role, technology, or difficulty"
    },
    {
      "name": "assess",
      "path": "./commands/assess.md",
      "description": "Evaluate your current knowledge level and get personalized learning recommendations"
    },
    {
      "name": "compare-paths",
      "path": "./commands/compare-paths.md",
      "description": "Compare learning paths between different roles to find the best fit for your goals"
    }
  ],
  "skills": [
    "./skills/ios-fundamentals/SKILL.md",
    "./skills/uikit-development/SKILL.md",
    "./skills/swiftui-development/SKILL.md",
    "./skills/ios-data/SKILL.md",
    "./skills/ios-networking/SKILL.md",
    "./skills/ios-testing/SKILL.md",
    "./skills/app-store/SKILL.md"
  ],
  "license": "SEE LICENSE IN LICENSE",
  "changelog": "See CHANGELOG.md for version history"
}

{
  "name": "android-development-assistant",
